a.n: Till Sex Do Us Part: Dunia Montenegro, Lesly Kiss & David Galant

p.k: Helen is a young actress at the best of her life, she's got the job she likes, good friends and a well positioned boyfriend. However Helen's life changes when Victor, a conceptual artist, asks her to be his model. From the first moment the attraction arises between them, and Helen falls madly in love,but Victor is compromised with a sweet innocent girl called Alicia. When Alicia arrives to stay for a few days, Helen will try to win Alicia's confidence and initiate her into the secrets of sex and pleasure. Alicia's perversion becomes a game where nobody will win... Or maybe yes?
